code: import{CREATE_PRODUCT,GET_PAGE_PRODUCTS}from"../constants/actionTypes";export default(function(){var products=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_PAGE_PRODUCTS:return action.payload;case CREATE_PRODUCT:return products;default:return products;}});
